snippet.title: Project Thea Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Project Thea is a dark strategy-survival RPG blending retro-futuristic urban fantasy with Slavic folklore. Rebuild your colony, explore the wastelands and engage in strategic card-based combat in this story-rich, roguelite adventure. Featuring branching narratives, character progression, single player or co-op for 2 players.

Wishlist https://store.steampowered.com/app/3360890/Project_Thea/?beta=1
